system.requirements: Tau, RT Rank 5+, Agility 45+. A Fire Caste Tau who has earned a RT Rank of honour to be proven worthy of piloting a Battlesuit.

description.value:
A Fire Caste member who Pilots a Mighty Battlesuit is one seen as a hero amongst the Tau. These advanced wargear range from the Hulking Stealth Suits to the Truly Massive Riptides whose sheer firepower can tear even super-heavy tanks asunder.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Tau Battlesuit Pilot Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talents Battlesuit Training and Veteran's Reflexes The wearer is assigned the use of a Tau Battlesuit.
